backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the booking/leads backend, defining types and state for bookings, leads, user profiles, and service categories, with CRUD operations protected by role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single feature: restoring the application to version 17 state, listing all affected frontend files and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing short descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a reference summary of the frontend codebase's structure and purpose.
frontend/admin-leads.html: Empty HTML entry point file for the admin leads standalone application.
frontend/admin.html: Empty HTML entry point file for the standalone admin application.
frontend/employee-leads.html: Empty HTML entry point file for the employee leads standalone application.
frontend/employee.html: Empty HTML entry point file for the standalone employee application.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, primary, sidebar, and chart color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point for the customer-facing app titled 'Naaz Studio - Makeup Booking', loading the React app via /src/main.tsx and including Google Fonts preconnect links.
frontend/src/admin-leads-main.tsx: Empty file for the admin leads application main entry point.
frontend/src/admin-main.tsx: Empty file for the admin application main entry point.
frontend/src/AdminApp.tsx: Empty file for the admin React application entry component.
frontend/src/AdminLeadsApp.tsx: Empty file for the admin leads React application entry component.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Customer-facing React app root that sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, services, booking, and booking-confirmation, wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Empty file for the access denied screen component.
frontend/src/components/AdminLayout.tsx: Empty file for the admin layout wrapper component.
frontend/src/components/AdminLeadsLayout: Empty file for the admin leads layout wrapper component.
frontend/src/components/AdminLeadsManage: Empty file for the admin leads management table component.
frontend/src/components/AdminLeadsProtec: Empty file for the admin leads protected route component.
Empty file for the admin leads table component.
frontend/src/components/AdminProtectedRo: Empty file for the admin protected route component.
frontend/src/components/EmployeeLayout.t: Empty file for the employee layout wrapper component.
frontend/src/components/EmployeeLeadsFil: Empty file for the employee leads filter panel component.
frontend/src/components/EmployeeLeadsLay: Empty file for the employee leads layout wrapper component.
frontend/src/components/EmployeeLeadsPro: Empty file for the employee leads protected route component.
frontend/src/components/EmployeeLeadsTab: Empty file for the employee leads table component.
frontend/src/components/EmployeeProtecte: Empty file for the employee protected route component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main customer-facing layout with a sticky header containing logo, navigation links, and login button, a footer with contact info and service area details, and a ProfileSetupModal triggered for authenticated users without a profile.
frontend/src/components/LeadCaptureModal: Dialog modal for capturing customer leads with name, phone, and email fields, pre-filled from user profile, submitting via the useCreateLead mutation with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/LeadsFilterPanel: Empty file for the leads filter panel component.
frontend/src/components/LeadsTable.tsx: Empty file for the leads table component.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and loading states with appropriate icons.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioGallery: Displays a responsive image grid gallery with a lightbox dialog for full-screen viewing and prev/next navigation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects a new user's name, email, and phone on first login and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: A route guard component that blocks access for unauthenticated users or non-admins, showing appropriate error states or a loading spinner.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCategoryC: A card component displaying a service category with an image, name, price, duration, and optional location overlaid on a gradient.
frontend/src/components/TeamMemberProfil: Displays a team member's name, role, bio, and a 2x2 grid of portfolio images in a responsive layout.
frontend/src/employee-leads-main.tsx: Empty entry point file, likely intended as the main module for the employee leads frontend app.
frontend/src/employee-main.tsx: Empty entry point file, likely intended as the main module for the employee frontend app.
frontend/src/EmployeeApp.tsx: Empty file for the employee React application entry component.
frontend/src/EmployeeLeadsApp.tsx: Empty file for the employee leads React application entry component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and status tracking via an AuthClient, persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, leads, bookings, and services, each wired to the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Playfair Display, Cormorant Garamond, Inter), sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a rose-gold/cream beauty palette using CSS custom properties for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBookingsPage.tsx: Empty file with no content; placeholder for the admin bookings management page.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLeadsDashboardPa: Empty file with no content; placeholder for the admin leads dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLeadsLoginPage.t: Empty file with no content; placeholder for the admin leads login page.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Empty file with no content; placeholder for the admin login page.
frontend/src/pages/BookingConfirmationPa: Displays a booking confirmation screen with a success icon, booking reference ID from URL search params, and navigation buttons to go home or book another appointment.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Multi-field booking form page that lets users select a service, date, time slot, and enter contact details, then submits a booking via the createBooking mutation and redirects to the confirmation page.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeDashboardPage: Empty file with no content; placeholder for the employee dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeLeadsDashboar: Empty file with no content; placeholder for the employee leads dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeLeadsLoginPag: Empty file with no content; placeholder for the employee leads login page.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeLoginPage.tsx: Empty file with no content; placeholder for the employee login page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page featuring a hero section, feature highlights, service previews grid, portfolio gallery, and team member profile for Naaz Studio.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services listing page that displays a grid of makeup service category cards and opens a LeadCaptureModal when a category is clicked, with CTAs to navigate to the booking page.
frontend/src/types/booking.ts: TypeScript type definitions for bookings, re-exporting BookingStatus from backend types and defining interfaces for MakeupService and Booking.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility function that reads a named parameter from either the URL query string or hash fragment, used to retrieve secret tokens passed via URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with CSS-variable-based oklch colors, custom fonts (Inter, Playfair Display, Cormorant Garamond), border radii, box shadows, and fade/slide animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the Naaz Studio project at schema version 1.0.0, recording one existing feature (restore to version 17) and no pending new feature requests.
